title: Cannot Add Bank When Editing Contractor
description: There is no button to add a bank account when editing a contractor.    I have tried to add a screen shot but it wont let me.

title: Name on Edit Contractor
description: Name should be First name and then Surname.  It should not all be in one box

title: View Button Doesnt Work
description: When i click on the "view" button nothing happens

title: Can we have a COMPLETED status
description: Can you have a completed status so I know what has been completed.  Right now I have submitted over 30 and i have no clue what has been completed and what is still under review / edit?

title: Normal Contract Creation
description:
When creating a normal contract all the financial headings show the dollar sign.  This needs to be removed.

Then when I got to select currency, the only currency available in the drop down box is USD.   We need to have access to all currencies.

title: Fix Add Normal Contract
description:
When i go to add a Normal Contract, it should say Client/Agency but right now it just says client and from there in the drop down box I can see the agency.

When I go to the next field where it says "Agency" in the drop down box there is includes all companies both my companies and agencies.

It should be as follows:

1.  First select the correct Aspirock Company.

2.  Then select "Agency/Client

3.  Then carry on as normal.

title: Remove Create MSA and Create SOW
description:
Contracts only needs to show Add or Edit a Contract.    Remove the MSA and SOW.

When a contract is created, we should then be able to also add and attached documents associated to that contract which might include a PDF, WORD, OR Excel file.    As part of the onboarding, we will be able to Track the status of the contract and the contractor by including things like, Client SOW received and signed.  MSA in place and signed etc......

title: Adding a contact
description: When adding a contact name it would be better if we could add first name and then surname in 2 separate boxes.

title: Auto correct capitals and lower case
description:
It would be nice if the fields once saved the portal will auto correct grammer and upper and lower cases.  For example, if some enters a name like
phil roebuck the portal should change that to Phil Roebuck once it is save.

If someone writes everything in CAPITALS it should change it to Capitals

title: Change Option from View To Add Contacts
description: Unless you click to see what view means you have no idea that it means you can add contacts to the agency client, so lets make it clear and change the view to view/add contacts

title: Adding Contacts to an agency / client
description:
When adding contacts to an agency / client we need to be able to add more information than just their name and if they are a contact or user.  We need the following:

1.  Name
2. Job Title ( if known )
3. Department
4. Notes: we need to be able to free text anything we might find useful to remember about this person.  Things like - he is in charge of all contract recruitment in USA and Canada.

title: Wont Allow Me to Save changes to convert from platform company to agency company.
description:
I made a mistake when adding a new agency company and it was saved as a platform company.  Then when I went to companies to edit the company and change it back to an agency, it allowed me to save it by hitting the update button but in reality it did  not make the changes.

To be honest, when we are using Agency / Clients, we do not need the option in there to make a company a platform company.   The only company we should be allowed to create when in Agency / Clients, is exactly that, an agency or a client nothing else.

title: Update Tenant company to agency
description: In the agency client i cant add tenant company only agencies

title: Feature Requests should go back to where they were so they trace where I am when I am requesting the feature.
description: The feature request has moved so now when you want to use it, it always defaults to saying you are requesting a new request.  It was much better when it was at the top of the page for everything because when you then selected feature request, it already knew where you were requesting it from.  Now i need to type a bigger explanation so you know where i am when I have spotted a bug.

title: I can only see United States when adding a new agency / client
description: I can only see United States as the country when I want to add a new agency or client.

title: test
description: testtetete

title: Needs URGENT fixing
description:
When I got to add a Agency Manager the features are wrong here.   It automatically asks for me to add an email and also a password so in effective this is creating a USER for the portal.     A few things are wrong here.

1.   I need to be able to add managers for client businesses as CONTACTS not always as a user of the portal.   

2.  If I do need to add one as USER then I need to be able to SEE the password I am creating.    The portal should give me the OPTION to add as user to the portal and if so then it should also say SEND LINK to join.  Right now even if I add them as a user the portal then does NOTHING?

title: UPLOAD FILE TO FEATURE REQUEST NOT WORKING
description: When I am using the Feature Request the system will not allow me to upload a file so this needs fixing urgently.

title: Add Additional Contacts In Agency / Client Companies
description:
We need to be able to add multiple contacts in an Agency / Client Company.   Right now I can only add 1 which is not good enough.     For example, we may have a client and a sales consultant in that client that deals with only IT Contractors but in that client we may also deal with another sales consultant who only deals with Telecoms Contractors etc.....

The portal needs to act like a CRM too so we can have multiple contacts within the same Agency / Client.
conditions: I have tried up UPLOAD a screen shot but the UPLOAD feature is not working either.

title: Add Full Agency Details
description:
Right now when I click on Add Agency / Client all it does is let me add a user?   Adding an Agency or Client should mean adding an Agency / Client company so this feature needs to include all details for adding an agency company along with their invoicing contacts etc........   Its seems you have this feature in "Companies" but you need to move it to "Agency / Clients".  Add new Agency / Client.   

This is very urgent because I cannot proceed until this is setup correctly.

title: Password When Adding New Contractor
description: When i add a new contractor it - when it comes to creating a password for the new contractor it is all hidden.    I should be able to see the password I am typing in so I know it is correct.  You should have to type it in twice so it checks you have entered it correctly before you hit the "create" button.

title: Add Routing Code To banking
description: When we add or edit a bank, some countries use just IBAN and SWIFT code, but some countries also need a Routing Code, so please add this to the banking details but remember its not compulsory, only some countries need it.

title: Side Menu Options
description:
The side menu should have these sub menus

Dashboard
My Profile
My Tasks
Agency / Clients
Contracts
Contractors / Workers
On Boarding
Payroll Partners
Timesheets
Invoices
Payslips
Remits
Referrals
Leads
Reports
Feature Requests
Settings

title: Adding a country doesnt do anything
description: On Settings - Countries, I tried adding a new country (GB / United Kingdom). When I click Create, nothing happens - no save, no error, no message.

title: MSA user selection doesnt clarify roles or purpose
description: When adding users to an MSA, all roles (agency, contractor, payroll, admin, etc.) appear the same, with no indication of what adding a user actually does (signer, viewer, internal only, etc.). Its not clear which users should be added or why.

title: Company Tenant dropdown should only show our own entities
description: In contracts, the Company Tenant field currently lists client companies and a generic Tenant Company, as well as our own entity. This field should only allow selecting our own operating entities (tenant companies), not clients.

title: Companies screen says client companies but also contains our own entities
description: On the Companies page it says Manage your client companies, but this is also where were adding our own tenant / legal entities (like our US company). That wording threw me off and made it unclear whether this screen is meant for clients only or for all companies in the system. Feels like there needs to be a clearer distinction between our own entities and client companies, either in the wording or structure.

title: Country dropdown only shows United States
description: When adding a company, the Country dropdown only had one option available: United States. There were no other countries to select.

title: VAT number showing for US company (should be EIN instead)
description:
When adding our own US entity, the form asks for a VAT number, which doesnt really apply in the US. For a US company, Id expect to see something like EIN (and potentially state tax IDs), and VAT would make more sense only for non-US entities.

Feels like the tax fields should change based on the country selected so youre entering the right info for that jurisdiction.

title: Tenant Company toggle is confusing
description:
wasnt really sure what the Tenant Company toggle actually means when adding a company. Its not obvious that this is meant to be our own entity vs a client company, and turning it on/off doesnt seem to change anything on the form or explain what impact it has. It made me stop and second-guess whether I was setting things up correctly.

It would really help if this was clearer (different wording, helper text, or something changing on the form) so you know exactly what youre doing when adding one of our own entities.

title: Adding Bank Account before entity
description: It feels a bit odd that I need to add a bank before creating our own entity. Normally the company would exist first, and banks would be added afterwards. Id suggest letting the entity be created on its own, with bank details added as a follow-up step

title: Creating New Bank Account when in the Add New Company
description: When I went into create new company and selected tenant company, I then went to select a bank and then selected "Create New Bank Account" which took me to the banking area.   I then selected "Add New Bank" and when i did that, it then remained in the banking feature.  It would be good if it then automatically took me back to where I left off in the add new company feature so I could carry on.  Instead I then had to exit the banking feature, click back into companies and start again with add new company which increases the amount of time to do this task.

title: Fix URL error message
description:
When adding a new tenant company and writing the URL www.aspirock.com I received an error message saying please enter correct ULR. 

The URL is correct so please fix this error message

title: It wont let me add a tenant company
description: When trying to add a tenant company, the only country that is showing in the drop down list is United States.    It needs to show ALL countries in the drop down list so I can select one.   See attached screen shot.

title: Change to English
description: Change all words to English please.

title: To much informations
description: There is way to much permissions, Need to be managed and be cleaner. Need to rework on that page

title: Bug UX
description: When i am into creationg a Feature Request i can scroll way more down
